formattedAddress: 60 Hudson St Suite 116b, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 Hudson St Suite 116b, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
One of the nicest DC’s/collocation facilities I have worked in but the best part of the facility are the people who work and manage it.
20 years in the business and I have yet to meet a group of people so focused on making sure not only the customer but its vendors get what they need to ensure a smooth deployment. The level of support and expertise is absolutely refreshing. A big thank you to
the entire Hudson IX team but special thanks to Arthur and Sander, not sure when they actually sleep but the caring and support never stops and is very proactive..
Best Regards !
Carlos L

originalText.text: The last month I had the pleasure of working with the Hudson IX team at 60 Hudson Street, and it was an unforgettable experience. From the moment I arrived, the staff went above and beyond and never stopped. The level of expertise and customer service was by far one of the best experiences I have had working in Data Centers for the last 25 years. Beyond the level of service this is one of the nicest Data Centers / Collocation facilities I have worked in.  Look forward to both working in the facility and with Sander Gjokaj and his team. Sander and his team played a major role in the deployment of the NY fiber  network and words cannot express the gratitude. Kudos to the Hudson IX team.

text.text: The last month I had the pleasure of working with the Hudson IX team at 60 Hudson Street, and it was an unforgettable experience. Sander and his team played a major role in the deployment of the NY fiber  network and words cannot express the gratitude. Kudos to the Hudson IX team.

originalText.text: Hudson IX's efforts to help us complete our 70% deployment goal have not gone unnoticed.  The entire team's professionalism, expediency, and flexibility are head and shoulders above what we normally experience with our data center vendors.  The whole Hudson IX team is terrific to work with.  Thank you!

text.text: Hudson IX's efforts to help us complete our 70% deployment goal have not gone unnoticed.  The entire team's professionalism, expediency, and flexibility are head and shoulders above what we normally experience with our data center vendors.  The whole Hudson IX team is terrific to work with.  Thank you!

originalText.text: I consistently work with a large number of data center vendors across the country and can easily say that HudsonIX is at the top of my list in pretty much all categories. Knowing that we have a vendor that we can lean on when crunch time rolls around is invaluable to us, HudsonIX takes all of the stress out of situations like this being as reliable as they are. Sander and the team here have been going above and beyond since our contracts were signed, I only wish they had more locations around the US!

originalText.text: Wonderful tour and helpful people at Hudson Interxchange. Great to see how these huge data centers work.
